question:
You want to sell your television. You think a friend of yours might like to buy it from you.




Write a letter to your friend. In your letter explain




Why you are selling the television
Describe the television
Suggest a date when your friend can come and see it
text: Hope this letter finds you and your family in radiant health. I am writing this letter to inform you about the sale of my personal television. The reason for selling is that my wife got a wonderful opportunity to work in London so we are migrating to a new place within 20 days. I am aware that you are looking for a television to buy so thought to inform you about this.

It's a LED Television  brand sony purchased in August Last year. This magnificent machine is built upon smart technologies which have Bluetooth,USB, and WIFI features and is very rare to get in the Sony brand under this segment.This Device hold 5 yrs warranty. The powerful sound quality of television makes the cult watching experience.Moreover, This device can be used as an extended monitor with a laptop for official work. Although, The radio feature is not activated yet  we can start after requesting an overcall to the service centre. This television is a special edition launched on the 70th Anniversary of the brand.

I would like to invite you to my house on 26th August to have a look at the television and we will also get a chance to spend some leisure time with a variety of delicious and healthy meals.I hope you will visit soon.
